minneapolis.neighborhoods: Downtown, North Loop, Uptown, Longfellow, Northeast, Dinkytown
minneapolis.meetingHighlights: Major recovery hub with meetings throughout city and suburbs; birthplace of Minnesota Model; strong Big Book tradition.
minneapolis.transitInfo: Metro Transit light rail and buses; Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport (MSP).

st-paul.neighborhoods: Downtown St. Paul, Cathedral Hill, Summit Hill, Highland Park, West Seventh
st-paul.meetingHighlights: Twin Cities recovery with historic treatment center connections; diverse neighborhood meetings; strong service commitment.
st-paul.transitInfo: Metro Transit light rail and buses; MSP Airport shared with Minneapolis.

rochester.meetingHighlights: Mayo Clinic city with medical community meetings; diverse international presence; strong recovery infrastructure.
rochester.transitInfo: Rochester Public Transit buses; Rochester International Airport (RST); I-90 corridor.

duluth.areaDescription: Duluth area, Lake Superior North Shore
duluth.neighborhoods: Downtown Duluth, Canal Park, Lakeside, Woodland, West Duluth
duluth.meetingHighlights: Lake Superior port city recovery; strong mining and shipping heritage; active downtown and neighborhood meetings.
duluth.transitInfo: Duluth Transit Authority buses; Duluth International Airport (DLH); Great Lakes port city.
